Class TestFlightConstructionState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.GameState
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.ConstructionState
it.polimi.ingsw.model.state.TestFlightConstructionState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TestFlightConstructionState extends ConstructionState
Represents a the construction phase of a Galaxy Trucker match, using test flight rules.
